member.name: P:NACO.Data.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NACO.Data.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:NACO.Data.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:NACO.Data.Normalization.normalize(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert all of the characters in a string according to the Authority File Comparison rules. Uses the Unicode character for the musical flat and uses 0x1F for the subfield delimiter. a UTF-8 string containing subfield delimiters (0x1F), subfield codes and subfield contents. Multiple subfields are expected but the marc tag and indicators are not expected. flag to leave the first non-trailing comma in the first subfield 'a'. a normalized string

member.name: M:NACO.Data.Normalization.NormalizeSimplified(System.String)
member.summary: Convert all of the characters in a string according to the Authority File Comparison rules. Uses the Unicode character for the musical flat and uses blank for the subfield delimiter. All commas are converted to blanks. a UTF-8 string containing subfield delimiters (0x1F), subfield codes and subfield contents. Multiple subfields are expected but the marc tag and indicators are not expected. a normalized string

member.name: M:NACO.Data.Normalization.NormalizeStandard(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Convert all of the characters in a string according to the Authority File Comparison rules. a UTF-8 string containing subfield delimiters (0x1F), subfield codes and subfield contents. Multiple subfields are expected but the marc tag and indicators are not expected. flag to leave the first non-trailing comma in THe first subfield 'a'. character to use for outputting musical flats a normalized string '''

The Current Code is Normalization.vb. Current developer: Anthony Gray (yho15524429@yahoo.com)
NACO.Data.Normalization methods perform normalizations on input strings according to the Authority File Comparison Rules set forth at http://www.loc.gov/catdir/pcc/naco/normrule.html
